catalog_script_client.name: Team roles form

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_e2c411411b6aac905e72ebd5604bcb97
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Team roles form</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    // Populate the team list
	var team_list = sessionStorage.getItem("team_list");
    var team_list_array = team_list.split(",");
	for (var i = 0; i < team_list_array.length; i++) {
		g_form.addOption('team', team_list_array[i], team_list_array[i] );
	}
	// Update the options allowed
	var permitted_environments = sessionStorage.getItem("permitted_environments");
	var permitted_environments_array = permitted_environments.split(",");
	g_form.clearOptions('environment');
	for (var e = 0; e < permitted_environments_array.length; e++) {
		g_form.setValue('environment', permitted_environments_array[e]);
	}
	g_form.setReadOnly('environment', true);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-23 18:42:06</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e2c411411b6aac905e72ebd5604bcb97</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Team roles form</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e2c411411b6aac905e72ebd5604bcb97</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-23 18:42:06</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Ansible Tower Team Role">c0cb470b1b5ee0505e72ebd5604bcb06</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
